unnormalised: Arrey yaar, statistics mhaka kitlo doko dukhoita! Mhonnllear, mhaka Bayes' theorem khorench somzonk kitli probability asa? Zait 0.0001%! Ani standard deviation vixim tor uloichinaka… mhoje marks mean-antlean itle deviating zatat, ki tem practically ek national disaster. Mhaka khobor asa ki lottery jinkpachi mazi chance (1 in 292.2 million) hea exam-ant pass zanvcheakui chodd asa. Seriously, hanvem anink ek normal distribution curve polleli zalear, hanv behosh zatam, boss!
normalised: Arey yaar, statistics mhaka itlo doko dita! Mhunnje, Bayes' theorem mhaka khorench somzoche probability kitle asat? Kiteak zero point zero zero zero ek percent asonk zata! Ani standard deviation vishim matui ulo nakat… mhoje marks mean thavn itle deviating asat, ki te ek national disaster bhaxen zalam. Mhaka dista lottery jinkoche chance (don she ani navvad tori don point don million madhye ek) hea exam pass zaunche thavn vodd asat. Seriously, hanv ani ek normal distribution curve polloilear, hanv bem padtom, boss!
